# rendersAsynchronously

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the canvas can present its contents to its parent view asynchronously.

## Declaration

```swift
var rendersAsynchronously: Bool { get set }
```

## Rendering

- **renderer**: The drawing callback that you use to draw into the canvas.

items.description: The drawing callback that you use to draw into the canvas.
